Address: Sector 32 Sohna Gurgaon Haryana, Sohna, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR
Landmarks: Near By G D Goenka University
desc:
A 2BHK + Study independent builder floor for sale in Flower Valley, Flamingo Floor, Sohna Road, Gurgaon.   Note - This is a 123-acre project, which has a huge backyard, & the front yard has boundary walls & lush green surrounding with a variety of flowers.  - The ground floor measures a super built-up area of 1093 Sqft. & carpet area is 644 Sqft. The basement with 873 Sqft. has a carpet area of 674 Sqft. (Total super area comes to 1966 Sqft. & total carpet area is 1318 Sqft.) - The basement is exclusively available with this floor, which has provision for kitchen, bathroom, a provision for sewage disposal. It is suitable for office, clinic, boutique & residential use. Vitrified tiles are used for this property as well as there is a small store in the basement.  - Construction of this property is done with RCC walls, which are pre-fabricated; the whole building is compiled for Zone-IV seismic zone. Property Specifications  This Vaastu compliant flat is placed on the ground floor & encompasses 2 bedrooms with wardrobes, 2 western bathrooms, 1 study room with cupboard, 4 split ACs, 1 living room and 1 modular kitchen. The property has 4 access - 2 in front and 2 to the backyard lawn.  Covered with Anti-skid tiles, the first bathroom is attached to the master-bedroom while the second bathroom is common for another bedroom & living-room. Top-quality Rocca & Jaguar fittings are used in these bathrooms. In addition, there is a counter near the basin. Moreover, vitrified tiles are used in the living room & kitchen whereas the study-room & bedrooms are embellished with wooden flooring. Facilities  One open parking space, power backup, water supply & security guards are available. Notable amenities like clubhouse, gym, children park, walking track, & fountain with restaurants are also provided.   Locality Located on Sector 32 Sohna Gurgaon road NH-248A and Golf course, this property is 1.5km from GD Goenka University and KR Managalam. Many IT parks are found at 4km and various builder floors are nearby. Medanta Hospital is within the reach of 7km as well as within the premises there are commercial stores available. MG Metro station is located at a distance of 12km.  Location highlights  It is 15 minutes from Rajiv Chowk (NH48) via the upcoming elevated corridor on Sohna Road. Educational institutes like GD Goenka, KR Mangalam & many more are already functional in the area. Medanta Hospital & Artemis Hospital are within 10-12 Kms. Famous brands VIZ. Max, Cinepolis, Disney, Splash, Lifestyle, F21 are in the vicinity. Adventure Park & Industrial belt are located nearby.  Lohagarh Farms, Damdama Lake, & Sulphur Springs are nearby. Westin, resorts, Lemon Tree, Country Inn are few hotels & resorts close-by. It has easy connectivity with Golf Course extension road, Kundli-Manesar-Palwal (KMP) corridor, Delhi Mumbai Industrial corridor, Southern peripheral road, developed Sohna Road & Golf Course extension CBD.

Get ready to become the proud owner of a meticulously crafted 3BHK apartment which is up for sale in Amrapali Zodiac, Sector 120, Noida. So, grab this opportunity before others do it!!Property SpecificationMeasuring a super area of 1325sqft, this apartment is brilliantly crafted to match various requirements of a family, therefore, owning this property to reside with your loved ones is totally a wise choice. Facing the auspicious east direction, this fabulous 3BHK apartment positioned on the 10th floor is blessed with adequate natural light and a cool breeze. Hence, residents of this apartment can enjoy the serene ambience all along the day.Semi-furnished; this abode encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2 western fashioned bathrooms with geyser connecting points, 4 wide balconies, a spacious living cum dining area, and a modular kitchen fitted with RO water filter. Also, electrical fixtures like lights and fans are fitted so you do not have to spend extra money on fixing the same.Furthermore, one of the bathrooms is commonly connected to 2 of the bedrooms while the other is connected to the 3rd bedroom. You can stay updated with the happenings on the main road from the balconies present in this residence. Of the 4 balconies; 2 are attached to 3 bedrooms, 1 is linked with the kitchen, and the remaining is with the hall.Enhancing the aesthetic appeal of this flat is the flooring immaculately topped up with vitrified tiles across all the rooms. FacilitiesThis elite residential society offers an array of amenities such as rainwater harvesting, cafeteria/food court, kids play area, bank & ATM, library and business centre, power backup, event space & amphitheatre, outdoor tennis courts, swimming pool, flower gardens, intercom facility, kids club, fire-fighting equipment, coffee lounge & restaurants, clubhouse, indoor squash & badminton courts, meditation area, jogging and strolling track, cycling track, park, indoor games room, gymnasium, security, retail boulevard (Retail Shops), outdoor tennis courts, DTH Television facility, piped gas, multipurpose courts, lift. desc:
Are you looking for a property benefitted with freehold ownership rights in a prime location? Yes? Then your wait ends here. Up for sale, this completely ready to move in 2BHK flat located in SCC Heights, Raj Nagar Extension, Ghaziabad is worth your consideration. So, hurry up!!! Property SpecificationsBeautifully designed according to Vaastu rules, this flat well placed on the 3rd floor of a 13 storey building is indeed an ideal place to live happily with your family members. This flat comprises two bedrooms, two bathrooms, one balcony, a living cum dining area, and a modular kitchen. All bedrooms are equipped with cupboards for placing all your valuables and other belongings. Designed in western style, one of the bathrooms is attached to the bedroom whereas the other bathroom is common. The balcony is attached to the bedroom and overlooks the main road and the beautiful garden. The master bedroom is adorned with wooden flooring while the rest of the flat is bright and beautiful with vitrified flooring. Facilities SCC Heights is loaded with a wide range of amenities such as visitor parking, waste disposal, rain water harvesting, service/goods, lift, kids play area, maintenance staff, swimming pool, flower gardens, intercom facility, kids club, fire fighting equipment, club house, cycling & jogging track, park, indoor games room, gymnasium, reserved parking, internet/wi-fi connectivity, private terrace/garden, piped gas, multipurpose courts and lift. Other facilities such as one parking area, 24x7 water supply, 100% power backup and tight security are available. Locality Raj Nagar Extension is a prominent location and is well-connected to other parts of the city with the help of public and private modes of transport. Hindon Metro Station is located at a distance of 6.5km from this place. You will find the well-known AK Children's Academy and Shemrock Public School within the vicinity. For any kind of medical help, Apex Healthcare and Research Centre and Life Cell Multi Specialty Centre are located close by. Noted banks and ATM centers are located within easy reach for all your financial transactions.

K728  DLF  Phase 2, DLF City Phase 2, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR
Landmarks: Walking distance from MG Road metro station. Behind DLF Central Arcade
desc:
A beautiful 4BHK semi furnished duplex builder floor is available for resale in DLF City Plot Phase 2, DLF City Phase 2, Gurgaon. Property SpecificationsThis elegantly designed adobe is spread across a super area of 4300 sq.ft and is perfectly ready to move in. Offering the benefits of freehold style of ownership, this adobe is built over basement and the ground floor receiving plenty of natural light as well as good ventilation. Overlooking the main road, the construction age of this north east facing building is less than 5 years and is relatively a new property.Splendidly configured, the layout of the basement encompasses two bedrooms, a puja room, two bathrooms, gym area, home theater room and a party hall. The ground floor comprises of two bedrooms, a kitchen, dining room, drawing room, three bathrooms and a servant room. The servant room is designed to have a separate entry and a common bathroom fashioned in western style. All the bedrooms are adorned with wardrobe and TV unit. Fashioned in western style the bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms, along with geyser and exhaust fan installed in them. All the rooms in the adobe are well furnished with ACs. Fully equipped Home Theater with Dolby sound is an added benefit to this adobe. The modular kitchen is appointed to include chimney, cooking range, microwave, granite platform and a stainless steel sink. The flooring of the kitchen is gracefully finished with granite tiles, whereas rest of the adobe is finished with stylish marble tiles. Also wooden flooring is nicely done to one of the bedroom. FacilitiesTwo open parking spaces are available to the occupants. The unit is also benefited with uninterrupted supply of water. Security of this complex is highly prioritized with 24/7 manned security services. For any repair works, utility service providers such as electricians and plumbers are easily available.LocalityDLF Central Arcade and MGF Metropolitan Mall are situated within a walkable distance from this tower. Delhi Public School, Sherwood Convent School and American Montessori Public School are some of the prominent schools available within 1km radius. Uma Sanjeevani Health Centre & Hospital, Kirti Ayurvedic Hospital & Research Centre and Sri Sri Ayurveda & Aushadh Panchakarma are some of the well known hospitals available within 10min walkable distance. ICICI Bank, HDFC Bank and Kotak Bank are some of the banking options available within 2km. MG Road metro station and Sikandarpur Metro Station are dotted within a distance of just 5mins by walk. Also commuting from this well established locality is not a problem, as various modes of public transport facilities are easily available.

desc:
Shipra Sun Tower, is a sprawling luxury enclave of magnificent Apartments in Ghaziabad, presenting you a meticulously designed 3BHK (1526sqft  super area)ready to move in flat up for sale which elevates the contemporary lifestyle.So hurry up and take hold of this wonderful opportunity of possessing your dream home at the earliest.Property SpecificationsLoaded with several top-notch amenities, Shipra Sun Tower is a brilliantly developed society, where you can enjoy the bliss of living a lavish and contented way of life with your loved ones. Comfortably positioned on the third floor in a sky-scraping building of 16 floors, this north-east facing flat enjoys the greatest possible cross ventilation & natural light keeping the ambiance fresh and bright.The configuration of this stunning flat encompasses 3 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 balconies, s dining cum living room and a kitchen. Of the three bedrooms, two bedrooms are provided with decorative wardrobes, where you can keep your collection of apparels and other valuables.Further, designed in western fashion & equipped with premium quality sanitary fittings as well as 3 geyser points, two bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms while the other is available for common use.Offering mesmerizing views of the verdant garden/park & the beautiful pool, one balcony is connected to the hall, while the other is linked to the kitchen. The contemporarily designed modular kitchen is provided with a comfortable space for cooking and is bedecked with a chimney and voluminous cabinets where you can keep your daily pantry requirements. Adding on to the aesthetic appearance of this fabulous flat is the elegant wooden flooring in the master bedroom, and impressive, cost-effective, and highly durable vitrified tiles flooring in the rest of the areas of the flat.FacilitiesSome of the modern amenities such as pool, garden, kids play area are provided for the convenience of the residents of the society.Other basic facilities like open parking space,  24 hours water supply, 100% power backup for common area & flat, and tight security with CCTV surveillance are also provided.LocalitySituated in one of the sophisticated areas of Ghaziabad, this society has easy access to the Shipra shopping mall, supermarket, and the local market which are situated within walking distance.Located within a short distance are some of the well-known primary & high schools available. Medical assistance is quickly available as the number of esteemed hospital, clinics, and nursing homes are present within the vicinity.The local bus stop can be reached within walking distance, the 62 Sector Metro Station is available within 1km only, which makes commuting to other parts of the city trouble-free. Within sniffing distance are the most important & leading nationalized & private bank & ATM centers located.

Seize this excellent opportunity of becoming the proud owner of a meticulously constructed 2BHK flat in Logix Blossom Greens, Sector 143, Noida. Available for sale and located in one of the most preferred residential neighbourhoods, this apartment with a nice blend of space and quality construction is reasonably priced. Property SpecificationPlaced on the 6th floor of a 16-storey building, this 100% Vaastu compliant flat will surely bring joy and happiness to you and your family members. Aptly designed with spacious rooms and well-planned layout, this apartment will offer a comfortable living space for any small family. Bestowed in the goodness of sunlight all day and ventilation, this lively abode is pleasant to live in. Further, it is beneficial to you as this flat is unfurnished so you can furnish it according to your convenience and taste. Thoughtfully planned, this north-east facing flat comprises 2 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 2 balconies, a living cum dining, a study room and a kitchen with a cooking platform and a sink. The perfectly finished vitrified flooring, which is easy to maintain and stain-free enhances the visual appearance of this abode.Up-to-date with all the electrical fixtures and curtains, this apartment is a fine place to consider. Both the bathrooms are designed in western-style and provided with all the fittings. One of them is attached and the other one is available for common use. Opening onto the views of the main road (highway) and garden, these airy balconies are connected to both the bedrooms. FacilitiesFor the easy lifestyle of the residents, prime amenities like open/covered parking space, round the clock water supply and 100% power backup are available. Outright security with guards and CCTV surveillance for the safety of your family members is provided too.The society is loaded with few important amenities such as 2 Lifts, Rain Water Harvesting, Club House, Swimming Pool, Gymnasium, Park, Reserved Parking, Water Storage, Service/Goods Lift, Visitor Parking, Intercom Facility, Maintenance Staff, Waste Disposal, Conference Room, Piped Gas, Jogging and Strolling Track, and Outdoor Tennis Courts. The sub locality is surrounded by Block GG 1, GG 2, JG 1, and Anand Kunj and Manohar Nagar of Vikaspuri, along with Krishna Park Extension and Tilak Nagar. While Janakpuri West Metro Station, which acts as an intersection between Blue and Magenta Line, is 2 km from the sub-locality, Janakpuri West Metro Station is 3 km away. New Delhi Railway Station is 22 km from the sub-locality, and T1 and T3 terminals of IGI Airport are 16 and 21 km and takes about an hour to reach."The nearest job hub to Vikaspuri Block J is the District Centre of Janakpuri, which is a hub of commercial activities in the region and is around 3 km from the sub-locality. One can commute to the employment hub of Connaught Place (CP), Noida and Gurgaon through metro through Blue and Magenta Line of the Delhi Metro. desc:
Truly gorgeous and studded with attractive interiors, here is the most fabulous 3BHK builder floor available for sale and is located in one of the friendly societies named as Himgiri Apartment in Kalkaji Extention, New Delhi. Hurry up and grab this great opportunity of buying this property…!Property SpecificationsApproved by RWA/Co-operative Housing Society, this adorable builder floor comes with freehold ownership right and is sprawled across 2300sqft of a super area & 2100sqft of a carpet area.With its most auspicious east direction, this ready to move in builder floor is aged less than 5 years and is ideally positioned on the 1st floor of the 2-storeyed building.Skillfully designed to match the living needs of the family, this furnished builder floor encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, balconies on three sides for complete ventilation, a hall with a 7 seater sofa set & AC, a lobby with 2 ACs and a well-configured kitchen. All the bedrooms are well-furnished with trendy wardrobes, 3 ACs and 3 double beds. The bathrooms are attached to the bedrooms of which, 1 is fashioned in western theme and the other is designed in an Indian style. Overlooking the patch of greenery (garden), 1 balcony is connected to one of the bedrooms, 2nd balcony is aligned with the hall and the 3rd balcony is utility area linked with the kitchen. The kitchen is adorned with the sleek platform, sink, cabinets and chimney that drives away the strong fumes & odour. Further, 1 bedroom is decked with wooden flooring whereas the rest of the rooms are embellished with the ceramic tiles flooring. FacilitiesOne open parking space is available for this residence to accommodate your vehicles comfortably. Round the clock water supply, garden and 100% power backup facilities are provided here. A security guard is appointed and CCTV cameras are installed in this society.LocalityMany prominent schools can be availed within a walkable distance from this builder floor. Within 5mins drive, you can access many reputed hospitals for any medical aid. The local market is available within 2 to 3mins walking distance to buy your daily needs. Plenty of well-known banks and ATMs are found nearby to meet your banking services. Several means of transportation like autos, buses & taxis within the proximity of this residential property.

desc:
Spacious 3BHK flat of 1230 sqft area is up for sale located in Sainik Colony, Sector 49, Faridabad, Delhi NCR. This property with construction age less than 5 years, is situated near Achivers Mall.  Property SpecificationsThis south east property is situated on the second floor of a two storey building, covering living room, kitchen, three bedrooms, two bathrooms, and two balconies. The kitchen unit is modular with granite counterpart, stainless steel sink and storage cabinets. Chimney is also installed in this kitchen. There are three bedrooms furnished with wardrobes and two bathrooms where one is attached and one is common. Both the bathrooms are fashioned in western style. There are two balconies that are attached to the two bedrooms and overlook the main road and other building. The living room and both of the bedrooms are decorated with trendy designed false ceiling along with LED lights as well as provision for AC. The electric fixtures such as lights and fans are installed in the whole flat. High end vitrified tiles are used for flooring of this flat. This property is vaaastu complaint and receives ample of natural light and fresh air throughout the day.  FacilitiesRound the clock water supply and electricity is offered for this building. 100% power backup facility is also offered. Electricians and plumbers are easily available for any kind of repair work. The safety of inhabitants is ensured security guards along with CCTV cameras. There is provision for Video Intercom facility as a part of security system. Covered parking slot is available for one vehicle in the basement.  LocalitySainik Chowk Bus Stop is located close to this building. Metro Train Depot Ajronda is located at a distance of 5.3km. Faridabad Railway Station is located at a distance of 7.1km from this building.For medical assistance, Aster Eye Hospital, ESI Hospital, Santosh Hospital, Royal Multi Speciality Hospital and Fortis Hospital are available within the vicinity of 4.9km. Jiva Public School, Ryan International School, Apeejay Svran Global School, St Columbus Convent School and Kendriya Vidyalaya No 1 are available within the radius of 4.7km from this building. HDFC Bank ATM, ICICI Bank ATM, Punjab National Bank ATM, Axis Bank ATM and Allahabad Bank ATM are accessible within the range of 1km for banking services. Aggarwal Funcity Mall and Vishal Mega Mart are located within the perimeter of 4.8km from this building. Achievers Centre Point Mall is located close to this building.  Public transport such as autos and cabs are easily available from this area.

desc:
Home seekers; get ready to seize this golden chance of owning a magnificent 3BHK apartment that is up for sale in Pan Oasis, Sector 71, Noida. Benefitted with modern amenities, this apartment perfectly matches the requirements of a medium family. So, without any further delay hurry up to make the most of this opportunity.Property SpecificationThoughtfully designed, this 3BHK apartment with the construction age less than 5 years is in a pristine state and is definitely worth investing every penny of your valuable money.Situated on the 16th floor, this apartment enjoys abundant flow of sunlight and fresh air all through the day hence residents can experience the refreshing ambience while at home.This abode spanning across an area of 1839sqft (super area) encompasses 3 well-designed bedrooms adorned with wardrobes, 4 chic bathrooms, 4 wide balconies, living cum dining room, study room and a sleek modular kitchen.Designed in western fashion are the bathrooms of this house among which 3 are attached to the bedrooms while the remaining is en-suite with the study room. Overlooking the park and the pool, the balconies of this apartment add additional space to relax after a long and hectic daily schedule. Moreover, 3 of the bathrooms are connected with the bedrooms while the rest is linked with the kitchen.The lady of your house will surely be impressed with the contemporarily designed kitchen of this flat that is well-appointed with a fine-looking countertop, a sink, spacious cabinets and a chimney. Further, the elegance of this abode is uplifted with classy wooden flooring finished in 2 of the bedrooms whereas ceramic tiles are covered on the flooring in rest of the house.  FacilitiesThis well-planned society is filled with state-of-the-art amenities like pool, gym, yoga centre, club house, community center, jogging track, kids play area, badminton and tennis courts.Parking is taken care of as one covered parking slot is allotted to the residents of this apartment and also basic facilities like uninterrupted water supply and CCTV camera for extra surveillance are also available. In addition, power backup is provided for ACs and the cost is already included in the quoted price.LocalityChoosing this apartment to settle down with your family is definitely a great choice as this property is sited in one of the finest locales that is home to various key infrastructures.Residents can easily fulfill their daily essentials as there are 24 daily needs shop within the society premise and even the HDFC Bank will be upcoming within the near future. The reputed GIIS School is adjacent to this property while Sapphire School is nearby.SRM Hospital situated within the vicinity can be reached for any medical aid and even the Kailash Hospital is up coming within the radius of 500m. Commuting would be much easier as the metro station is only half a kilometre away while the local bus stop is just around the corner.

desc:
Promising ultra-luxurious lifestyle, this artistically crafted 3BHK residential flat is up for sale in the prestigious society apartment ?Jal Vayu Vihar? in the prime locality of Sector 21- Noida. Worth buying, this residential property beautiful interiors, modern amenities, and strategic location. So, hurry up and seize this excellent opportunity of owning this flat at the earliest.Property specificationsSited on the 6th floor, this residential flat encompasses 3 elegant bedrooms, 2 well-designed bathrooms, 2 sizeable balconies, attractive living cum dining room, and chic modular kitchen. The well-planned layout ensures a proper inflow of sufficient natural light and good cross ventilation throughout the day, thereby keeps the indoor atmosphere refreshing and pleasant.All three bedrooms are perfect for relaxation and include wardrobes and double beds. Further, these bedrooms are outfitted with the ACs - an added advantage. The bathrooms are designed in western style along with geysers and have been attached to two bedrooms. Further, these bathrooms can also be accessed from the living room with the help of interconnecting doors.The modular kitchen ensures better utilization of the available space and is well-equipped with a large granite platform, stainless steel sink, chimney, and lots of storage cabinets. Furthermore, among two balconies, one is connected to a bedroom while another is linked with the passage. Both these balconies provide an unblocked view of the main road and surrounding greenery.Coming to the flooring, the presence of high-quality vitrified tiles across the flat accentuate the overall look further. The basic facilities such as 24-hour water supply and open parking slots for 2 cars have been provided. Moreover, benefited with freehold ownership rights, this residential flat is the perfect option for experiencing an ultra-luxurious lifestyle along with your family.  FacilitiesApart from the basic facilities, the society building also provides the benefits of modern amenities such as round the clock CCTV surveillance, power backup for common area and lift, maintenance staff, kids club, kids play area, flower garden, rainwater harvesting, water storage, waste disposal, fire fighting equipment, clubhouse, as well as jogging and cycling track. LocalityFor quality education, reputed schools like Sunriseville School and Indian National Public School are located close by, whereas Bal Bharati Public School is located within the society?s compound. The Corporation Bank, HDFC Bank, and Axis Bank are nearby for banking services. Further, Spice World Mall is hardly 1km away from this site for shopping and entertainment.For quick medical support, noted Metro Hospital and Heart Institute and ICARE Eye Hospital are close by, while Kailash Hospital and Apollo Hospital are about 1km away. Furthermore, Noida Sector 15 Metro Station can be found within a 1.5km distance.

desc:
An exquisitely designed 4BHK apartment is available for sale in Omaxe Royal Residency, Sector 44, Noida. Hence; considering this property to dwell with your much-adored family is certainly a wise decision.Nestled on the 6th floor, this flat is inclusive of 4 bedrooms facilitated with almirahs, 4 bathrooms, 7 balconies, a generously sized living cum dining room, and a modular kitchen fitted with a chimney. However; 2 bathrooms are ensuite with the bedrooms while the other is common and the 4th bathroom is attached to the servant’s room.Offering you the spectacular views of the garden/park and the pool; the well-proportioned balconies are ideal to relax. Among the 7 balconies present here 4 are connected with the bedrooms, one is with the dining area, one is linked with the drawing-room, and the rest is with the kitchen.To give this abode an elegant look; wooden flooring is done in all the bedrooms and the rest of the flat has vitrified tile flooring. Address: vatika Gurgaon 21 Gurgaon, Sector 83, Gurgaon, Delhi NCR
desc:
Vatika Gurgaon 21 is a premium and well-designed residential project structured by the renowned engineers introducing a 2 BHK ready to move flat up for sale in Sector 83, Gurgaon offering comforts and amenities at one place needed for an exquisite lifestyle. Property SpecificationsSituated amidst the landscaped greenery, Vatika Gurgaon 21 is a conceptualized residential project approved by the Haryana Urban Development Authority designing its infrastructure on the super area of 1432 sq ft. This relatively new north-east facing flat with age less than 5 years is situated in a sky-scraping apartment of 18 floors, with 1406 as its flat number. To describe the structure of this residence, it mainly consists of 2 ventilated bedrooms, 2 western bathrooms, 2 balconies, a dining cum living room, and a kitchen.  Installed with an exhaust fan and superior quality sanitary fittings, one is an attached bathroom, and the other can be commonly used, where your personal space & comfort is preserved by us. Lush-greenery, a beautiful park, and the club are visible from the two spacious balconies, one adjoined to the kitchen and the other opening to the hall, where you can refresh oneself with the soothing breeze circulating your ambiance. Taking into consideration the convenience of the lady of the house, the kitchen area is provided with a liberal amount of cooking space bedecked with a granite platform, an exhaust fan and spacious racks providing extra space for storage.  To add on to the aesthetic appearance, the elegant vitrified tiles which come in a wide variety of design options are affordable, do not require much maintenance and retains the beauty of the interiors and the residence. FacilitiesVatika Gurgaon 21 is a grand gated community project which provides a generous covered parking in the basement, has day & night water facility, complete power backup, and a CCTV is also installed to provide you a safe, tension-free and peaceful living environment.  To fix any kind of repairs, utility service providers such as plumbers, electricians etc are available within a short call. LocalityBuses are the major means of transport in Gurgaon, which connects  Sector 83 to some of the major suburbs, towns and other parts of the city offering a comfortable, safe & in time journey. Providing you 24x7 banking services are some of the leading banks and ATM centers closely located. In the society itself, you can locate the daily needs shop and the local bus stop is close by, which caters to all your basic needs like vegetables, groceries, clothes, home decor, and other items. Delhi Public School and the Matrikiran School are some of the prominent educational institutions of Gurgaon consisting of excellent staff offering good quality education. Adding on to the advantage of this area is that the society consists of a reputed clinic where you can rush in the happening of any emergencies or accidents.

desc:
Absolutely ready to move with your treasured family, is this 3BHK apartment situated in one of the well-known projects of Paras Tierea, Sector 137, Noida. Paras Tierea is indeed a great choice if you are planning to buy a cozy residential unit in Noida, as it is loaded with all major facilities. So, hurry up and seize this deal at the earliest possible time.  USP- A garden is available near to this property and the balcony of this property touches the green area. Further, a metro station is coming up at a radius of 300m.  Property Specifications  This apartment is sprawled across a super-built-up area of 1330 sqft and is brilliantly designed to let in abundance of natural light and fresh air. Situated on the ideal ground floor, this apartment encompasses 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a living cum dining room, a kitchen and 3 balconies. Wardrobes are fitted in all the bedrooms to give a well-organized look to the interior of the bedrooms. Both the bathrooms are fashioned in western style, among which, one bathroom is attached to the bedroom while the other bathroom is available for common use.  A geyser is installed in one of the bathrooms to ensure instant supply of hot water. Furthermore, the attentively designed kitchen which is equipped with cabinets and exhaust fan ensures a cozy cooking experience. Offering the beautiful view of the plant bushes, all the 3 balconies come attached to the bedrooms. Moreover, to give an appealing look, flooring of the bedrooms is covered with ceramic tiles while wooden flooring is available in the rest of the apartment.  Facilities  Paras Tierea promises a luxurious living to its residents by offering various modern amenities like club house, swimming pool, gymnasium, internet/Wi-Fi connectivity, park, power backup, lift, rain water harvesting, reserved parking, security, visitor parking, intercom facility, maintenance staff, DTH television facility, banquet hall, piped gas, jogging and strolling track, etc. Other vital facilities benefited for this apartment include one covered parking space, 100% power backup, adequate water supply, and 24-hours security surveillance along with CCTV surveillance.   Locality  Various prominent educational institutes are located at a short distance from this apartment while the famous Felix Hospital is around 2.1Km away. The Vaishali Mega Mart is situated within a distance of 7.2 Km.  Apart from these, you just have to take a 2 minutes walk to fulfill all your shopping needs. So, without having any second opinion, grab this property as early as possible to lead a contented lifestyle forever…!Property SpecificationsWith its most desirable east direction, this 100% vaastu compliant flat is aged between 5 to 10 years and is comfortably rested on the 8th floor of the 12-storeyed building.Benefited with freehold ownership rights & outfitted with lights & fan in all the rooms, this furnished flat comprises 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 balcony, a living cum dining area and a modular kitchen with cabinets & extended platform.Of the 3 bedrooms, 2 bedrooms are beautified with wardrobes whereas 1 bedroom is well-appointed with 1 bed. Designed in a western mode & outfitted with exhaust fans, 1 bathroom is attached whereas 1 bathroom is common.Overlooking the cricket stadium, the airy balcony is commonly connected between two of the bedrooms. Further, the living cum dining area is furnished with a 5 seater sofa set, 1 center table, a 6 seater dining table and a diwan.For a decent look, all the rooms are embraced with the vitrified tiles on the flooring.  FacilitiesThe key amenities/facilities like 1 covered parking slot for 2 cars, club house, kids play area, gym, park, intercom facility, 24hours water supply, 100% power backup, security guard and CCTV cameras are available here.LocalityThis residential property is located just 500m away from the Delhi-Meerut Expressway thus enjoys seamless connectivity to major parts of the city. Also, the well-known banquet hall and petrol pump are found close by this flat.The leading GD Goenka Public School, DPS and Parevartan School are found within 5kms from this residence. The notable Vardhan, Apex and Navjeevan Hospitals are accessible within 3 to 4kms for any healthcare issues. For easy commuting, you can access the Hindon River Metro Station at 6kms and different public transports next to this property.You can find the VVIP Style Mall next to the property and an upcoming KW Delhi 6 Mall within 2mins walking distance to accomplish your shopping needs. The renowned SBI Bank is available within the building to meet your banking services. Also, there is a double security due to SBI Bank within the society.
